trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref> class.
Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
The actual size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
`false` in all cases for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `false`.
`false` in all cases.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the vertical axis is possible.
`true` in all cases for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `true`.
`true` in all cases.
Gets the vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Scrolls the content down by one line.
Scrolls the content left by one line.
Scrolls the content right by one line.
Scrolls the content up by one line.
Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object is visible.
The object to make visible.
A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to be made visible.
The rectangle that is visible.

Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)"></xref> pass.
The maximum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref>.
Scrolls the content down the number of lines indicated by the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines"></xref> property.
Scrolls the content left the number of lines indicated by the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines"></xref> property.
Scrolls the content right the number of lines indicated by the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines"></xref> property.
Scrolls the content up the number of lines indicated by the <xref href="System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines"></xref> property.
Invoked when a layout pass begins.
This method invalidates the measurements of elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel>.
Scrolls the content down by one page.
Scrolls the content left by one page.
Scrolls the content right by one page.
Scrolls the content up by one page.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The amount that content is horizontally offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Sets the amount that content is vertical offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The amount that content is vertically offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref> hosts items for.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel"></xref> hosts items for.
Gets the vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
